Text:
A few days later. The Shadow Garden gathers once
again for joint training with the Seven Shadows.
Haaahh!
I won't fall...for the same move!
...You dodged it, huh.
I can't let you finish me off just yet.

(My current abilities aren't enough to match Lady
Zeta's agility. That's why I need to pay careful
attention to the space between us and keep my
distance—)

I like the look in your eyes... Alright, this time
I'm coming at you from this side!
Aghhh...!

(Such speed and power... I was prepared to be on the
defensive, but...)
(Each blow is...intense!)
*huff, huff*
Oh, you held out. Well done. But now—
—it's over.
...Now!
You deflected it?!
(...It's just as Master Shadow said.)

Observe her movements closely and pick up on her
habits. Zeta gets bored quickly, so if you hold out
long enough, she'll reveal an opening.
Now!
Ack?!
Haaaaaaahhh!

Wow, you got me good. You've suddenly gotten a lot
better.

Got you...? You won in the end, didn't you,
Lady Zeta?

I was pretty close to losing there, you know?
I didn't expect you to take advantage of my
brief opening.

...I figured that your concentration wouldn't last
long, and if I could just endure, an opening would
present itself.

Still, I didn't expect you to evade my attack from
that position.

Well, being one of the Seven Shadows, I can't afford
to be defeated that easily.
...Then I shall catch up to you soon enough.

Oh? You've got a good look on your face...
Something happen?
Yes... Something "good" happened.

What? Look at you, being all secretive. That makes
me all the more curious.
I have my secrets, just like you, Lady Zeta.

Then I guess I'll have to pry it out of you in our
next training session. You'd better be ready.
Hehehe. I look forward to it.

(Thank you, Master Shadow...! Because of you, I was
able to go on the offensive against Lady Zeta.)

(I may have lost this time, but next time, I am
determined to win...!)

And I will dedicate that victory to you, Master
Shadow—

...Ahem. No. 559, may I have a moment? It's about
your mission the other day...
...Y-Yes!
Lady Beta. Was there a problem with my report?

No, no issue on that front. There's just one thing
that slightly concerns me.

The base had already been wiped out by someone,
and despite your search efforts, the identity of the
perpetrator still remains unknown.
Regarding that...it is as I've reported.
Oh well... In any case, I'm relieved.

Knowing you, I thought you'd be more frustrated.
But it seems my worries were unwarranted.

Thank you for your concern. Although it is
frustrating I couldn't crush them with my
own hands, that just wasn't an option this time.

...Putting that aside, I heard you mention Master
Shadow just now—

Well, well, if it isn't the great writer herself.
How's the writing coming along... Wait, No. 599?

Epsilon, please don't interfere! I'm trying to
gather some valuable material for The
Chronicles of Master Shadow!

Are you stuck again? You said the same thing the
other day.

I-I'm making progress just fine! The joint training
threw my schedule off a bit, but if I pull an all-
nighter—

...Anyway, back to Master Shadow! No. 559! You have
some new information about him, don't you?!

(The Chronicles of Master Shadow...intended to
immortalize his deeds for posterity...)

(Of course, his recent annihilation of the Cult's
base deserves a chapter in the Chronicles. But—)
It's our little secret.
Our...little secret...?!

No, not at all. Being a regular member, I hardly
have any opportunities to see him.
True... What to do? I've got writer's block...
Shall I help you brainstorm ideas again?

No, thank you! Your stories are mostly just humble
brags... I mean, I can't tell if they're true or not!

(Ohh... I alone know something about our lord that
they all want to know about...)

(The secret shared only between Master Shadow and
myself, unknown even to the Seven Shadows, the
Numbers, or anyone else in the world... Hehehe...!)

...No. 559, you've got the strangest expression on
your face. Are you okay...?
Hehe. Is there a problem?
No, not really, but...
Well then, if you'll excuse me. Hehehe...hehehehe...
S-Sure...

...Hey, Beta. Isn't that girl unusually upbeat
today? Um, eerily so...

Yes. I thought for sure she was feeling down.
Looks like we were wrong...

Hehehehe... Please watch me, Master Shadow. Someday,
I promise I will be by your side...!

Holding her "little secret" with Master Shadow close
to her heart, No. 559 is resolved to attain even
greater strength...
